sentences.sentence: The Kremlin claims it's foiled a significant drone attack on Moscow, shooting down eight Ukrainian missiles over parts of the city.

He explained it saying that Wagner is not able to transfer all equipment in good condition by the 1st of June. The UK Defense Ministry said as of the 24th of May, Moscow-backed self-proclaimed so-called Donetsk People's Republic forces have likely entered Bakhmut to start clearance operations. In recent weeks, elements of the 31st Brigade of Russia's Airborne Forces have likely moved from the Svatovo-Kreminna area to reinforce Bakhmut's flanks. The Institute for the Study of War previously observed the elements of a 132nd Separate Guard Motorized Rifle Brigade of Moscow-backed self-proclaimed so-called DNR army corps operating in the Bakhmut direction after previously fighting in the Avdiivka area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The transfer of these other Russian units to Bakhmut may further slow Russian efforts in the other areas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian forces had taken 20 square kilometers on Bakhmut's flanks as of 16th of May.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The rotation out of Wagner forces is likely to continue in controlled phases to prevent collapse in pockets around Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The Institute for the Study of War says the tempo of Russian operations around Bakhmut remains notably low.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Russia has issued a warrant for the arrest of Republican U.S. Senator Lindsey Graham over comments he made during a meeting with Ukraine's President Zelensky.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In a video released of the meeting, Graham says that there are too many Russians dying in the war and then says that the money spent on military aid to Ukraine was the best spent ever. Although the two comments were apparently made in separate parts of the conversation, they appeared together, provoking Russian anger. On Twitter, Graham welcomed the warrant, but said he doubted his chances of getting a fair trial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The second round of the Turkish presidential elections, which resulted in the re-election of Recep Tayyip Erdogan, was free but not fair, international observers said on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: One major factor, they said, was the candidate's access to the media, with incumbent Erdogan having a much greater media presence than his opponent Kamal Khalilzadharlu. As in the first round, biased media coverage and the lack of a level playing field gave an unjustified advantage to the incumbent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Both candidates came under criticism for targeting minority groups.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I really would like to urge, like Farah as well, to refrain after the campaign from violence speeches, hate speeches against minorities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Whether it's LGBTIQ from one side of the political spectrum or if it's refugees, what we unfortunately saw in the second round from the other side of the political spectrum.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Erdogan has the thorny mission of tackling an economy hit by rampant inflation and managing the reconstruction of areas affected by the February earthquakes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Turkish lira plunged to record lows against the dollar on news of his election victory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The ceasefire in Sudan between government forces and rival paramilitary rapid support forces has been extended for another five days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Earlier ceasefires have proven fragile in the past, having been flooded by both sides.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Monday saw renewed fighting in the area of the capital Khartoum.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Since the war began in mid-April, at least 886 civilians have been killed and thousands wounded, according to the Sudanese Doctors Association.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: They say the death toll could possibly be much higher.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The war has also displaced nearly 1.5 million people, both internally and to neighboring countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: China has sent its first civilian astronaut into orbit. Professor of aeronautics, Guihai Chao, is one of a crew of three who are expected to spend five months in space.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Guihai Chao will be responsible for space experiments, while the military astronauts will be operating and managing the spacecraft.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This is China's fifth manned mission to its space station since 2021.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On Monday, Beijing announced plans to send astronauts to the moon before 2030.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The bodies of four people have been recovered from Italy's Lake Maggiore after a pleasure boat capsized in a storm.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Those who died included two Italian intelligence agents, a former member of Israel's security services and a Russian woman.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Italian victims were identified as Claudio Alonzi and Tiziana Barnobi.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: About 20 passengers survived and were either picked up by other boats or swam ashore.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: There is little doubt among experts Europe will endure a difficult summer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The EU Commissioner for Crisis Management, Yanis Lanerchich, told reporters that this year is already much drier than average. And this drought combined with the heat we're expecting is of course a major driver of forest fires. It's for this reason that Lanerchich announced that the EU has doubled its firefighting fleet to face a summer season that is expected to be intense.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The European Firefighting Air Fleet will increase from 13 to 28 aircraft, 10 firefighting aircraft, 14 light amphibious aircraft and 4 helicopters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In addition to this fleet, which is distributed over 10 countries, there are more than 400 firefighters available in Greece, France and Portugal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The European Commissioners stressed the importance of the community's civil protection mechanism, which was activated over 100 times last year, when Europe suffered the hottest summer in its history.
